description: This table extracts the related multiple response Pend - Resume Indications of Use (I IEV 2090) item, which records the indications of use for pended medications in medication reconciliation

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the event record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with pended indications associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PEND_INDICATIONS_ID
columns.description: This column saves the pended indications when a discharge med is resumed.

columns.name: PEND_INDICATIONS_ID_MEDICAL_COND_NAME
columns.description: This contains the name of the medical condition.
